content: The RFC merged, and I filed a tracking issue since I couldn't find an existing one. https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/85811, would be great if someone could fill it in with links to all the tracking issues for edition features

@Manish Goregaokar The edition is being tracked in a project board here: https://github.com/orgs/rust-lang/projects/7
Perhaps it could just link to that?

Also, it looks like the links at the top of the RFC didn't get the link text changed, would appreciate a review on https://github.com/rust-lang/rfcs/pull/3135 to fix it (and some others that have similar problems).
